SEARCH
Package library

Class Library

java.lang.Object
library.Library
public class Library extends Object
The Library class represents a library system that manages books and provides various operations on them.

    • booksSort

      public void booksSort(String option, String desc)
      Sorts the books in the library based on the specified option in descending order.
      Parameters:
      option - The option based on which the books are sorted.
      desc - The sort order, which is not used in this method but maintained for consistency.
